item.title: Call for Sponsors
item.description: Join us! Become a sponsor of the second edition of the Global PyLadies conference!

item.title: Submit your talks to PyLadiesCon 2024!
item.description: Just like last year, PyLadies Con 2024 will be a multiple-lingual online conference, happening at 6th-8th December 2024.

item.title: Save the date!
item.description: Attention all PyLadies community members! Weâ€™re excited to share that we are in the early stages of planning a PyLadies Conference (PyLadiesCon), a transformative event designed to promote diversity, learning, and empowerment within the Python community.
